## DragTarget.onDragOver() method

Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble is dragged over this drag target.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDragOver(_dragElement: IDraggable): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_dragElement | [IDraggable](./blockly.idraggable.md) | The block or bubble currently being dragged. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
